dialogue.introduction: I'm Destroyer Shimakaze. When it comes to speed I'm the best there is, swift like the island breeze!
dialogue.library_intro: I am Shimakaze, the Shimakaze-class ship that was developed as the pinnacle of destroyers, fast and armed with heavy torpedos. After all, I can go faster than 40 knots. However, we were not suited for mass production so I was the only one built.
dialogue.secretary3: Want to race? I won't lose.
dialogue.secretaryidle: Hmm… Ah! I'm just talking with Rensouhou-chan now… sigh…'cause I'm bored!
dialogue.secretarymarried: Eh? Admiral, you're tired from running? How slo~w!... But, do your best!
dialogue.wedding: Admiral, did you watch me running? Heh, it's fast, yeah? Yeah? *smug*
dialogue.show_players_score: Seems like there are messages addressed to you, Admiral.
dialogue.equipment1: Can I keep getting faster and faster?
dialogue.equipment2: Don't blame me if I get even faster!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: I want my engines serviced too!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Rensouhou-chan needs to be fixed, too.
dialogue.docking_complete: So the repair is completed. Slow!
dialogue.ship_construction: It looks like another ship slower than me has been constructed.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The fleet finally came back. Slow, huh?
dialogue.battle_start: There's nobody that can keep up with me, you know!
dialogue.night_battle: I told you there's no escape from Shimakaze!
dialogue.mvp: I'm the best? Really? I knew it! I'm fast, after all!
dialogue.minor_damaged2: Too much exertion gonna heat things up...
dialogue.sunk: I guess being fast isn't all...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: There so much rain around this time of the year, I feel so bad for Rensouhou-chan and the gang. Summer come quick! Hurry it up!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: Summeeer! Let's go swimming with Rensouhou-chan. I won't lose even if we compete in swimming! After all, I'm fast!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Cleaning is very troublesome~. I want to eat New Year Food, hurry hurry, o, oh!
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! This year, Shimakaze's faster than anyone else, watch me...uu!
